description:
Train and gradually build strength with progressive resistance. The Pulley Kit allows you to reduce the resistance on each grip during your hangboard workout to train difficult grip positions even if you can't hang your full body weight from them. An excellent way to manage and measure progression and reduces the chance of injury.

  • Can be used with any hangboard
  • Kit contains: 2 Pulleys, 1m of 8mm cordelette, and 2 eye bolts
name: Trango Rock Prodigy Pulley Kit
